backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing pictures, messages, treats, and user profiles with admin/user authorization, CRUD operations, and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two win-popup UI features with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose across layout, sections, hooks, editors, and games.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme variables defining light/dark Valentine color palettes and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app root and main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, profile setup, owner tools, and rendering the Valentine layout with the GameSection.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button using Internet Identity to log in or out with status handling and query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for creating a user profile with name input, mutation handling, and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/game/CupidAimMin: Click-target mini-game where players hit a moving target 10 times to win, with reset logic and hit animations.
frontend/src/components/game/HeartClickM: Implements a timed heart-clicking game with moving targets where reaching a score of 15 triggers a win callback.
frontend/src/components/game/LoveWordMin: Provides a word-unscrambling game that cycles through love-themed words and triggers a win after solving three.
frontend/src/components/game/MatchPairsM: Creates a memory matching game with icon pairs that shuffles cards and calls onWin when all pairs are matched.
frontend/src/components/game/RewardsModa: Displays a modal showing reward images and messages, with actions for replaying or returning to the menu.
frontend/src/components/game/SweetSortMi: A color-sorting game where sweets are sorted into matching color bins, triggering a win when all are correctly placed.
frontend/src/components/game/WinLoveMess: Shows a temporary animated popup displaying a random love message when visible.
frontend/src/components/game/WinPopups.t: Displays celebratory pop-up images at random positions when activated and clears them after animation.
frontend/src/components/owner/ImageUploa: Dialog for adding or editing pictures with image validation, preview, upload progress, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/owner/MessagesEd: Interface for listing, adding, editing, deleting, and reordering messages using related mutations.
frontend/src/components/owner/OwnerAcces: Alert dialog shown when a non-owner user attempts to access owner-only content.
frontend/src/components/owner/OwnerEdito: Floating settings panel that shows owner-only editing tools or an access‑denied dialog based on admin status.
frontend/src/components/owner/PicturesEd: UI for listing, sorting, deleting, and editing pictures, including an image upload dialog.
frontend/src/components/owner/TreatsEdit: Editor for creating, editing, deleting, and reordering sweet treats with form handling and mutations.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Sectio: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/valentine/sectio: Main game hub managing mini‑game selection, win handling, rewards, and admin vs user content access.
Landing section with a Valentine intro message and a button that scrolls to the photos section.
Displays unlocked or admin‑visible messages with loading, empty, and locked states.
Shows unlocked or admin‑visible photos, including a modal viewer and locked/empty states.
Renders unlocked or admin‑visible treats with emoji icons and locked placeholders.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Valent: Page layout with themed background and footer including a dynamic copyright and link.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to identity, updating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Provides hooks for checking admin status and fetching the caller’s user profile via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameProgress.ts: Tracks completed mini‑games in sessionStorage and exposes helpers to query and update progress.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity, login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessages.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching, creating, updating, deleting, and reordering messages via the backend actor with toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/usePictures.ts: Provides hooks to manage pictures through the backend actor, including fetching, adding, updating, deleting, and reordering with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useTreats.ts: Implements hooks for CRUD and reorder operations on sweet treats using the backend actor and React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useUnlockedContent.ts: Exposes hooks to fetch unlocked pictures, messages, and treats for the logged-in identity, sorted by position.
frontend/src/hooks/useUnlocks.ts: Provides a mutation hook to increment unlock counters and refresh unlocked content queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color themes, animations, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the App component.
Converts backend error messages into user-friendly text with special handling for common auth and network issues.
frontend/src/utils/imageValidation.ts: Validates image files by checking type and size against allowed JPG/PNG formats and a 5MB limit.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameter cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s metadata, feature definitions, and request tracking for a mini-game love‑message popup feature.
